::Killfest::

Killfest shakes his head, firing again at the base. From how the new ship was firing apparently at everyone, he wouldn't doubt if their next target would be the Destrons and Preds again.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Cygnar::
>     As he watched turn of events he stood wide-eyed in amazement.  They could 
> still win with the two bases shooting at each other.  He reopens the com.  
> "ALL UNITS THROUGH THE TUNNEL!  WE MAY YET WIN THE DAY!"
